mama prathipaththi garuka deshapalanayak karanne.tharunayinta math wathura dila chandaya gaththata, in idiriyata tharuna jiwithawalata mokada wenne kiyala eewa dena aya hithuwa da kiyana ekayi prashnaya.

ba්randiks samagama wisin kahawaththa pa්radeshaye janathawata parithyaga karana lada nala lindak.ba්randiks lanka samagama 2007 wasara thuladi kuda jala sampadana wyapruthin 468 k sampurna karamin ga්ramiya pawul siya gananakata sahana salasa deyi.anuradhapura, polonnaruwa, kanthale, thi්rakunamalaya, monaragala saha hambanthota pa්radesha wala wesena samagame karmanthashalawanhi sewaye niyuthu sewakayange ha ee pa්radeshawala wasaya karana janathawage jala awashyatha sapuralima sandaha nala lin saha nala marga idikaramina samagama aarambha kala “ba්randiks soyuru sathkaraya” wyapruthiya osse samagama ki්rayathmaka kala aayathanika samaja wagakim wyapruthiya yatathe 2008 wasaredith ewani wyapruthi ki්rayathmaka kirimata apethsha karana bawa samagama kiyayi.2006 desambar masa sita ba්randiks samuhaye sewakayange paudgalika jala awashyatha pilibanda samagame samaja wagakim eekakaye niladharin sidu kala pulul agayimak ema wyapruthiya sandaha padanama wu bawa ba්randiks aayathanika samaja wagakim eekakaye pa්radhani anusha alas mahathmiya pawasuwaya.
thaman ha sinhalayan athara athi sankhyathmaka wenasa adu kara ganima thula sinhalayan bahutharaya bawa hadawathin windimata thibu akamaththa buddhiyenuth tharamak ho yukthi yuktha karagatha hakiyi

palamuwenma kiwa yuththe mema potha mama aasa ghanayata ayath nawakathawak nowe.mama samanyen sathutata ho wismayata pathwenne minis hagim bahulawa sandahan wana poth kiyawimenya.mata danena piliganna de thawath keneku akuru kara thibenu dakina wita ma sathutatath wismayatath pathwe.ee harunu wita siduwu deyata hethu rahithawa siduwim pamanak pelagaswa athi poth mage sith nogani.koyyota saha sunethrata mama wada kamathi mema hethu deka nisa wiya hakiya.me satahan thabana mohothe hithata pamini adahasa nam ma mema potha wenuwata loka sahithyen pothak nogenawe manda yannayi.kese ho me wana wita ma eya kiyawa awasana bawin ee pilibanda satahan thabe.
ese nokarannenam adala maduru koyil sannamaya kisiwaku miladi nogannawa atha.
me gana adhyanaya kala widwathun ge matha yan salakillata gatha yuthuya.
ithamath kanagatudayaka wanne punaruththapanaye di issara nam hamuwanne wayasa awurudu 20 – 22 daruwan wuwada dan awurudu 16 – 17 dakwa tharamata ema wayas kandaya pahala basa thibimaya.
ammage hin as dekata thawa ekaparak ebila balanna thibunanam man aasayi.
haki tharam anek ayata priya upadawana sulu aakarayata aahara ganna.
menna me gate thiyena thanata kunynye thiyala gahapiya.

mema kandaya yatathe ayadum kirimata sudusukam labanne ginum himiya pamani.
me podi siddiyak.
"illan kala balan inna ekayi aththe" kiyalayi mama komentuwa awasan kale.
wamanshika paksha illuwa janadhipathiwaranaya thiyanna epa kiyala.
me siddhiyedi nithiya ha samaya kriyathmaka kirimata katayuthu kirimedi atham polis niladharingen adupadukam siduwuwath samasthayak lesa polisiyen wishala sewawak siduwu bawa kiwa yuthuyi.

meya allah wetha imahath (papayak) ya.322 33 : 54 numbaala yam dayak elidaraw kalath nathahoth sangawa thabuwath allah siyalu de gana sarwagnyayek we. 33 : 55 (nabiwarayage bharyawan wana) owunge piyawarun, puthun, sohoyuran, sohoyurange puthun, sohoyuriyange puthun ha sthrin, owunge wahalun107 wishaya yehi owun kerehi kisindu waradak natha.

me maniyo aushdha itha sarayi ayata apahasuyi kiyamin prathikshepa kala.
athirekawa aaradhana, salaka aadi wu pindu piliganime da waradak nathibawa anupa්ragnyapthi walin dakwa atha.

perawaru 6 – 7 sila samadanaya, anushasanawa ha bhawanawa maharagama mahinda himi, 8 – 9 dharma deshanaya kambaurugamuwe mahanaga himi, 9.30 – 10.30 dharma deshanawa maduluwawe sobhitha himi, paswaru 12.30 – 1.00 pirith sajjhayanaya, 1- 2.30 bhawanawa meheyawima gamini pi්rayantha mahatha, 3 – 4 dhammapada wiwaranaya chandrasoma ginige mahatha saha wisharada damayanthi jayasuriya miya, 4 – 5 was aaradhanawa, 5 – 5.30 buddha pujawa ha sil pawaranaya.boralle shri gothami wiharasthanaye asala pohoya nimithi karagena sila samadanayak pawathwimata wihararaksha dayaka sabhawa saha aarya mahila samithiya katayuthu yoda atha.ude 6. 00 ta sila samadanaya thelwaththe achalanaga himi, 6.30 sambuddha pujawa bhawanawa meheyawima aatigala amithadewa himi, 9.45 budusarana puwathpatha bedadima hasitha diyabalanage thilanka diyabalanage sohoyuran, 10.00 ta dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi yatihagala wijitharathana himi, 11 sambuddha pujawa, paswaru 1.30 dharmadeshanawa rajakiya panditha pitigala wijitha himi, 3.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi rathgama upananda himi, 4.30 dharma sakachchawa ambaanpola nyana thusitha himi, 5.30 ta atawisi buddha pujawa meheyawima dolos bage santhanaga himi.nadungamuwa, uuruwala sabhawe wiharayedi wiharadhipathi mahara pradeshiya sabha manthri yagoda siwali himiyange aacharyathwayen pasgammana panynyananda nahimiyange upadhyayathwayen kula daruwan dedenaku asala poda perawaruwe sasun gatha kare.siyambaalangamuwa, hulannuge muhandiramlage jemis grebiyel appuhamige saha porathmudiyanselage sumanawathi dampathinge puthanuwan wana aruna madhushanka kumaruwa saha sella katharagama dambae pare wijenayaka siriwardhanage rathnasiri saha thubewanniaarachchilage lalitha nilanthi dampathinge puthra rawindu shrimal kumaruwa mese asala poda perawaru 10.16 ta pamana pawidi bimata pathkare.

ehema kiyawana kathawala awasanayak yathra kisima dawasaka dana nogannawa unath, mula mada aga galapannath, samahara anumana kirim walatath, nigamana walatath yathra pahasuwen elambaenna puluwan nisa aadara katha witharak neweyi ahena gatena dakina oonama oopa dupayak kiyawana eka yathra puruddak wela thibuna.
